name: ios9-navidrome-web-player
description: a very lightweight, iOS 9-compatible web client for Navidrome/Subsonic servers, designed with a super simple aesthetic and a lot of room for imporvement. Pretty narrow use-case, but if you just found your old ipod touch or just added some web functionalities to your iPod classic and want to put to use that enormous self-hosted music library, this was made with exactly you in mind.
